sentence.Network_en: The majority have a built-in Luddite mentality; they are resistant to change.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分人天生有种反对技术进步的心理。他们抗拒变革。

sentence.Network_en: He had a petit bourgeois mentality.
I cannot understand the mentality of football hooligans.
sentence.Network_cn: 我无法理解足球流氓的心态。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 把心态（mentality）的差值等同于3条线距离。把后防线（defensive line）等同于整体队形的压上程度。
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... mental a 智力的；精神的 mentality n 智力；精神 comment n 评论，评注.
...people are driven by the get-rich-fast mentality.'mentality：心态，智力，意识Mr. Qu says he isn't building a company just for t.
Second , opening mentality and point of view ., 二是开放的思路和心态.

新浪教育_新浪网 ... 2. pressed adj. 加压的,压制的,模冲,挤压的 3. mental arithmetic 心算 4. eagerness n. 热心.
精神疾病（Mental Illness）：情绪失控或其他精神疾病均有专门的医疗机构。你的医生会将你推荐给心理咨询医生。
探路者_百度百科 ... 分享共赢 sharing & win-win 阳光心态 sunshine mentality 正直诚信 integrity & honesty.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (in the sense 'mental process'): from the adjective mental + -ity. Current senses date from the mid 19th cent

entry.def: Your mentality is your attitudes and your way of thinking.

example.ex: Running a business requires a very different mentality from being a salaried employee.
example.tran: 经营企业所要求具备的心态和上班族的心态截然不同。

means.word_mean: 1. a habitual or characteristic mental attitude that determines how you will interpret and respond to situations

sentences.sentence: "he's got plenty of brains but no common sense"

auth_sentence.content: I thought we showed real good mentality as well.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought we showed real good mentality as well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I thought we showed real good mentality as well.

auth_sentence.content: But he adheres to his father's buy-and-hold mentality.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he adheres to his father's buy-and-hold mentality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he adheres to his father's buy-and-hold mentality.

auth_sentence.content: Now we're often just in a survivalist mentality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now we're often just in a survivalist mentality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now we're often just in a survivalist mentality.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 焦躁不安的,失去理智的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+ment思考,神智+ed……的→去掉理智

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment思考,神智+al……的→adj.精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
a无+ment思考,神智+ia病→无智力的病
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment注释+ary表名词→n.注释, 解说词
mental精神的+ity表名词→n.心理,意识

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment心智+ation表名词→n.精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
ment思考,神智+ion表名词→有思考→向导,提到[词性变化:作动词]
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment[n.注释,评论,意见 v.[on]注释,评论]+ate表动词→v.作实况报道,评述

means.word_mean: 心态; 思想方法；思想状况

sentences.en: He has many years' experience of the criminal mentality.
sentences.cn: 他研究犯罪心理有多年经验。

jushi.english: He is only a person of average mentality.
He has many years' experience of the criminal mentality.
jushi.chinese: 他有多年研究犯罪心理的经验。
